title: Ranked Play Troll Protection
body:
Hi Everyone,

After a few games where someone gets a lane they don't want (usually sup) and try to forcefully acquire another players role I believe it would be a good idea to add a feature where if 4/5 of the team nominate the game as trolled the game is forfeited before loading.
The accused will be reported and punished if repeated.
This could be an effective work around to weed out corrosive members in the community with the right tweaking etc.


Thoughts?

replies.body: good theoretically. i had to go bot once bc this guy just picked gp and went top (didn't do too well). but the thresh sup was good so i didn't mind anyway

Personally, I'd like to see a report feature that sends champion select chat logs to a tribunal for review. Players who force roles on other players are able to be punished through [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and the normal report system. But making reports more accessible will hold these toxic players accountable more often IMO.

Re-queue systems are nice when they work (e.g /remake), but they often have to be half measures because it's simply too hard to circumvent the potential for abuse.
Maybe in yoloq but not flex as there is too much potential for abuse in flex.
With the correct tweaking/rules/scripting premade abuse will not be an issue

sounds like it's getting too convoluted already; just have an in champ select report feature, but only for forcing lanes because I don't want to get reported for picking janna, lulu, zilean or something that most people consider trolly in ranked.
Makes sense to me, something needs to be done.
